name: ventera-code-test
description: 1. Conversion equations     * Formula Conversion Constants         * 9/5 = 1.8             * 9/4 = 2.25             * 10/8 = 1.25     * Conversion algorithms         * Fahrenheit to             * Celsius	 C = ( F - 32) / 1.8             * kelvin	K = ( F + 459.67) / 1.8             * Rankine	 Ra =  F + 459.67         * Celsius to             * Fahrenheit	 F =  C × 1.8 + 32             * kelvin	K = C  + 273.15             * Rankine	 Ra =  C × 1.8 + 32 + 459.67         * kelvin to             * Celsius	 C = K - 273.15             * Fahrenheit	 F = K × 1.8 - 459.67             * Rankine	 Ra = K × 1.8         * Rankine to             * Celsius	 C = ( Ra - 32 - 459.67) / 1.8             * Fahrenheit	 F =  Ra - 459.67             * kelvin	K =  Ra / 1.8
